geneVariantDescriptions.description: POLD1 mutant indicates an unspecified mutation in the POLD1 gene.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a clinical study, immune checkpoint inhibitor (ICI) treatment, including CTLA4, PD-1, and PD-L1-targeting antibodies, resulted in prolonged overall survival (34 vs 18 months, p=0.004) in patients with advanced solid tumors harboring POLE or POLD1 mutations compared to wild-type patients, and POLE/POLD1 mutation served as a predictor of response to ICI (p=0.047, HR=1.41) independent of MSI-H status (PMID: 31415061).

references.title: Evaluation of POLE and POLD1 Mutations as Biomarkers for Immunotherapy Outcomes Across Multiple Cancer Types.
